thread.title: BRIEF-Zhanjiang Guolian Aquatic Products sees FY 2017 net profit up 49 pct to 70.3 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhanjiang Guolian Aquatic Products sees FY 2017 net profit up 49 pct to 70.3 pct

organizations.name: zhanjiang guolian aquatic products co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Zhanjiang Guolian Aquatic Products Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 49 percent to 70.3 percent, or to be 140 million yuan to 160 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 93.9 million yuan
* Comments that expanded catering market and optimization of product structure as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/3hU3qT
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
